description:
Sieg activates Ride of the Valkyries, the same card that defeated both Haga and Ryuzaki at the same time!  If that one card can defeat two duelists instantly, what chance does Jonouchi have all by himself?  Jonouchi better have one last card to turn this duel around before Sieg’s Valkyries carry him off to Valhalla!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: モンスター抹殺の女神
